description: Application for a minor material amendment to provide for one additional apartment on the second floor, external alterations and replacement drawings to parent permission 20/01095/FUL. The parent permission being for Application for a minor material amendment to the approved drawings including enlargement of the front entrance and to rationalise and improve the internal space for the apartments and minor alterations to the roof design of the forward projecting element to the parent permission 19/02421/FUL allowed on appeal. The parent permission being for a proposal under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 regarding the demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of one 3 storey block comprising 8 x 1 bed. apartments with ancillary parking and bin storage facilities approved under planning ref. 19/00866/FUL to allow external changes to increase the size of the dormers, terraces and depth of the building and  improvements to the internal layouts of the apartments to increase the internal floorspace.
